languages.text: "Стойте! Когда душа упадет на чашу весов, бренную плоть ожидает лишь два пути... Награда и кара... Суд грядет!"

traits.locale_text: "Стойте! Когда душа упадет на чашу весов, бренную плоть ожидает лишь два пути... Награда и кара... Суд грядет!"

languages.text: "Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgement comes!"
languages.original_text: "Стойте! Когда душа упадет на чашу весов, бренную плоть ожидает лишь два пути... Награда и кара... Суд грядет!"

traits.locale_text: "Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgment comes!"
"Stop! When the spirit is weighted, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward and punishment... The judgment comes!"
"Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgment comes!"
"Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgement comes!"
"Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgement comes!"

languages.text: 「駄目よ！魂が計量されるとき、死すべき肉体に待ち受ける結果はふたつのみ…報酬か、罰か…判決が下るわ！」
languages.original_text: "Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgement comes!"

traits.locale_text: 「駄目よ！魂が計量されるとき、死すべき肉体に待ち受ける結果はふたつのみ…報酬か、罰か…判決が下るわ！」

languages.text: «¡Alto! Cuando se pesa el espíritu, solo hay dos resultados posibles para los mortales... Recompensa o castigo... ¡ha llegado el juicio!».
languages.original_text: "Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgement comes!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto! Cuando se pesa el espíritu, solo hay dos resultados posibles para los mortales... Recompensa o castigo... ¡ha llegado el juicio!».

languages.text: “住手！对凡人而言，灵魂被放在天秤上之后，只会有有两种结果……要么是奖励，要么是惩罚……审判开始了！”
languages.original_text: "Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgement comes!"

traits.locale_text: “住手！对凡人而言，灵魂被放在天秤上之后，只会有有两种结果……要么是奖励，要么是惩罚……审判开始了！”

languages.text: « Arrêtez ! Quand l'esprit est mis sur la balance, il ne peut y avoir que deux issues pour la chair mortelle : la récompense ou la sanction... L'heure du jugement est venue ! »
languages.original_text: "Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgement comes!"

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez ! Quand l'esprit est mis sur la balance, il ne peut y avoir que deux issues pour la chair mortelle : la récompense ou la sanction... L'heure du jugement est venue ! »

languages.text: "Halt! Wenn die Seele gewogen wird, gibt es für das sterbliche Fleisch nur zwei mögliche Optionen ... Belohnung oder Bestrafung ... Das Urteil kommt!"
languages.original_text: "Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgement comes!"

traits.locale_text: "Halt! Wenn die Seele gewogen wird, gibt es für das sterbliche Fleisch nur zwei mögliche Optionen ... Belohnung oder Bestrafung ... Das Urteil kommt!"

languages.text: "Dur! Bir ruh tartıldığında, o fâninin bedeninin sadece iki akıbeti olabilir: Ödül ya da ceza... Yargılanmak hepimizin kaderi!"
languages.original_text: "Stop! When the spirit is weighed, there are only two outcomes for the mortal flesh... Reward or punishment... Judgement comes!"
